response.overview: An office-worker rabbit lives every day trapped in his monotonous work cycle, reliving the same moments over and over. One day on a smoke break he encounters a wild rabbit and this shifts his life forever, haunting him with constant visions, long after.  Whilst trying to keep up with the ceaseless demands and endless paperwork of the office, he finds himself falling further and further into turmoil, trying to navigate disorientating hallucinations whilst staying afloat under the pressure to keep up with the pulsing corporate lifestyle.  As the visons occur more and more frequently and the workload never seems to get any less, his stress reaches a crux and he finds himself snatched from reality and  transported into a surreal, hallucinatory world where he finally must confront the wild rabbit.
response.title: ESC
